attributes.action: Knight Captain Tom Moore 99 year old war veteran.
attributes.additional_details:
Captain Tom Moore is 99 yrs old, served this country in the 2nd world war.
Captain Tom Moore wanted to raise £1000 walking 100 lengths of his garden with the aid of a walking frame before his 100th birthday for the NHS to thank them for 1, looking after him through his years after breaking a hip & breaking ribs & puncturing his lungs & because of what they are doing today to get this country through covid-19.
As of 15.04.20 he has raised over £4.5million.
attributes.background: Want you to agree that Captain Tom Moore deserves/should be awarded a Knighthood for what he had done for this country in WW11 & now wanting to raise £1000 for our NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
